item.description:
Just dropped off Teddy Bears at Salvation Army Don't forget to come to

The Teddy Bear Parade is this Saturday December 1, 2012 @ Sunrise Assisted Living 1395 Massachusetts Ave. Arlington, MA 11 am - 2 pm .

All Bears Given to Children in Need at Christmas after event.

Pictures with Santa (think he comes at noon), Craft Fair .

Bear Judging for Best Dressed, Most Original & Totally Hand-Made

Everyone is welcome even if you didn't help Get Teddy Ready (you can get ideas for next year) .
item.how_to_find_us: Inside with all the Teddy Bears who are on Display

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Teddy Bear Parade at Sunrise Assisted Living Arlington, MA
